name: Bro
description: "Be with your bros! Feeling down? Has COVID-19 been wreaking havoc on your mental health well-being? Men need a safe space to open up about mental health. At BRO, we strive to be that space! BRO Token aims to bring mental health to the forefront utilizing the marketing wallet to bring world class motivation speakers and mental health specialists to popular platforms such as Discord, Telegram, and Twitter."
